DESCRIPTION:2015 Gibson Songwriter Deluxe Studio finished in Natural. This square shoulder acoustic produces a rich, balanced sound. The guitar is in very good overall condition but it has been gently played, so expect some small pin sized depressions and surface swirl marks . The guitar features a solid spruce top and solid rosewood is used on the back and sides. The bound fingerboard is made of rosewood and is inlaid with mother of pearl parallelograms . The headstock also features the inlaid Gibson logo and crown inlaid in pearl and a 2016 truss rod cover indicating that this guitar has the features of the current production version. Other unique features include gold Grover tuners, rosewood bridge and the signature Songwriter tortoise pattern pick guard. The unique voice of this guitar can be amplified thanks to its factory installed Fishman Prefix Plus T side mounted preamp with built in tuner.
